name: Flask-Dance with Dexcom
description: Testing Flask-Dance's OAuth integration with Dexcom

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

DEXCOM_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by Dexcom
